description:
Confidential File 614, The Enemy Within: Asahi and Yukimura struggle with the nature of their relationship, while the mole leaking Nue secrets is found... or is he?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dossier secret 614, Le Ver dans le fruit
Kimitsu Jikou Roku Ichi Yon: Shishishinchuu Mushi
機密事項六一四 シシシンチュウムシ
